name: Spell Casting
description: You have the innate ability to cast common illager spells. The target the spell is the entity you are looking at and can be chosen through blocks. Every spell will cost half a shank of hunger to cast. Each spell has its own cooldown but will also cause a shorter, global spell cooldown that prevents any spell use. Every spell can be enhanced by holding a totem of undying but will cost an additional half shank of hunger and half a heart. The hunger spell cost will become a health cost instead if you are too exhausted (3 or less shanks of hunger).
